Task.Name: Destination Analysis
Task.Description: Evaluate potential tourist destinations for feasibility and attractiveness.
Task.Product: List of recommended destinations with pros and cons.

Task.Name: Package Development
Task.Description: Create diverse travel packages catering to different customer preferences.
Task.Product: Portfolio of well-designed travel packages.

Task.Name: Marketing Campaign
Task.Description: Design and implement a marketing campaign to promote new packages.
Task.Product: Increased brand visibility and customer inquiries.

Task.Name: Online Presence Enhancement
Task.Description: Optimize the company's website and social media for better online visibility.
Task.Product: Improved website traffic and engagement on social media.

Task.Name: Customer Service Training
Task.Description: Train staff in providing excellent customer service.
Task.Product: Improved customer satisfaction and positive reviews.

Task.Name: Collaboration with Local Businesses
Task.Description: Establish partnerships with local businesses for mutual benefits.
Task.Product: Enhanced customer experiences and additional services.

Task.Name: Digital Booking System Implementation
Task.Description: Integrate a user-friendly digital booking system.
Task.Product: Streamlined booking process and improved efficiency.

Task.Name: Travel Insurance Options
Task.Description: Provide information and options for travel insurance.
Task.Product: Increased customer confidence and risk mitigation.

Task.Name: Crisis Management Plan
Task.Description: Develop a crisis management plan for unexpected events.
Task.Product: Improved company resilience and customer safety.

Task.Name: Sustainable Tourism Practices
Task.Description: Integrate eco-friendly and sustainable practices.
Task.Product: Position the company as environmentally responsible.

Task.Name: Mobile App Development
Task.Description: Create a mobile app for easier access and bookings.
Task.Product: Increased user engagement and bookings through the app.

Task.Name: Customized Itinerary Planning
Task.Description: Offer personalized itinerary planning services.
Task.Product: Increased customer satisfaction and loyalty.

Task.Name: Cross-promotions with Airlines
Task.Description: Establish partnerships with airlines for joint promotions.
Task.Product: Discounts or added benefits for customers.

Task.Name: Guided Tour Services
Task.Description: Provide experienced guides for specific destinations.
Task.Product: Enhanced customer experience and cultural immersion.

Task.Name: Online Travel Resources
Task.Description: Create informative content and resources on the company website.
Task.Product: Increased website traffic and authority in the industry.

Task.Name: Customer Loyalty Program
Task.Description: Implement a customer loyalty program with rewards.
Task.Product: Increased customer retention and repeat business.

Task.Name: Performance Analytics
Task.Description: Implement analytics to track key performance indicators.
Task.Product: Informed decision-making and continuous improvement.

Task.Name: Price Structuring
Task.Description: Develop competitive pricing strategies for each travel package.
Task.Product: Price list for various tour packages.

Task.Name: Customer Feedback Collection
Task.Description: Implement a system for collecting and analyzing customer feedback.
Task.Product: Insights for continuous improvement and enhanced customer satisfaction.

Task.Name: Market Research
Task.Description: Conduct market research to identify emerging travel trends.
Task.Product: Detailed report on current market demands and potential opportunities.
